title: Five-Star Vietnam City Break with Top-Rated Spa
description: Stay in the heart of concrete jungle Vinh Yen when you use Crowne Plaza Vinh Yen City Centre, an IHG Hotel, as your five-star base. During your stay, be sure to stop in at HOP Kitchen for a mouthwatering hot pot before making a beeline for Amber Spa for a rejuvenating massage, body scrub or facial. Meanwhile, a modern fitness centre, hot and cold jacuzzi, dry and steam sauna, and an outdoor swimming pool are all invigorating ways to while away your time.
